text: Apani taderake dekhenani yaderake bala hayechila, ‘tomara tomadera hasta sambarana kara, salata kayema kara [1] ebam yakata da'o [2]?’ Atahpara yakhana taderake yud'dhera bidhana deya hala takhana tadera ekadala manusake bhaya karachila allahake bhaya karara mata athaba tara ceye'o besi ebam balala, ‘he amadera raba! Amadera jan'ya yud'dhera bidhana kena dilena? Amaderake kichu dinera abakasa kena dilena na[3]?’ Baluna, ‘parthiba bhoga saman'ya [4] ebam ye taka'oya abalambana kare tara jan'ya akherata'i uttama [5]. Ara tomadera prati saman'ya parimana'o yuluma kara habe na.’
